abstract: The company is seizing on the popularity of widgets — small online tools that function like mini-Web sites — for its latest push into advertising.
snippet: The company is seizing on the popularity of widgets — small online tools that function like mini-Web sites — for its latest push into advertising.
lead_paragraph: Google is seizing on the popularity of widgets — small online tools that function like mini-Web sites — for its latest push into advertising.

headline.main: Google Program Enlists Mini-Sites as Selling Tool for Advertisers
headline.print_headline: Google Program Enlists Mini-Sites as Selling Tool for Advertisers
